opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Salas v. United States and Torres-Vasquez v. United States

opinion:
543 U.S. 1116

SALAS
v.
UNITED STATES; and
TORRES-VASQUEZ
v.
UNITED STATES.

No. 03-10427.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 24, 2005.

1

542 U.S. 927; Petitions for rehearing granted. Orders denying petitions for writs of certiorari vacated. Motions of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of United States v. Booker, ante, p. 220.
